ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not ENTIRELY true.  There is a quest to make a peacekeepers staff in erudin. It is a decent weapon for a young priest or Paladin.  Its a two-handed staff
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> You *cannot* make the Runed Totem Staffs, nor any other weapons yet.
>
> Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
> Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
> http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

Not ENTIRELY true. There is a quest to make a peacekeepers staff in erudin.
It is a decent weapon for a young priest or Paladin. Its a two-handed staff
with a 6 DF and 27 Delay and adds +10 charisma when equipped. But its not
available to most players, and is completely useless for anyone but a cleric
warrior or paladin.
--
Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult
Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to enslave."
